metadata.title: CVE-2023-23454 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: cbq_classify in net/sched/sch_cbq.c in the Linux kernel through 6.1.4allows attackers to cause a denial of service (slab-out-of-bounds read)because of type confusion (non-negative numbers can sometimes indicate aTC_ACT_SHOT condition rather than valid classification results).

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
